Reviews.Title: Very easy once you talk to customer service
Reviews.Author: Christine Vogt
Reviews.Content: I am mildly computer saavy, and this product seemed fairly easy to setup. I wasn't getting a video, and once I contacted the seller, they set me up with amazing customer service. He walked me through everything, and we realized that my cameras came unplugged. Loving the quality and the help!!!! Very satisfied!!!

Reviews.Title: Absolutely awesome.
Reviews.Author: LT Sharpe
Reviews.Content: I initially had a kguard dvr and camera set and the quality was pretty bad on the recorded and streaming video.  I took those cameras and put them on this dvr and it was night and day.  Crank up all the quality settings and bask in the glory of this thing.  It's got all kinds of great configuration options and the motion masking tool is easy to use.  My only complaint is that the hard drive was not well secured inside the unit.  Other than that it's an incredible deal.  I'm going to pair it with some even better cameras and really go nuts.
